sentences.en: a gesture of good faith
sentences.cn: 善意的表示

sentences.en: As a gesture to security, cars were fitted with special locks.
sentences.cn: 出于安全上的考虑，这些汽车装上了专用锁。

sentences.en: Brad gestured towards the door. ‘Get out.’
sentences.cn: 布拉德指着门口说﹕“出去。”

sentences.en: He gestured for her to take a seat.
sentences.cn: 他示意她坐下。

sentences.en: He made a rude gesture at the driver of the other car.
sentences.cn: 他向另外那辆汽车的司机做了个粗野的手势。

sentences.en: He raised his arms in a gesture of supplication.
sentences.cn: 他举起双手，做祈求状。

sentences.en: His gift was an extremely kind gesture. Credit where credit's due.
sentences.cn: 他的礼物是很友好的表示，这值得称赞。

sentences.en: I gestured toward the boathouse, and he looked inside.
sentences.cn: 我朝停船小屋打手势，他在里面看了看。

sentences.en: I made a gesture of dissent.
sentences.cn: 我做了个表示不同意的手势。

sentences.en: It was a very kind and thoughtful gesture.
sentences.cn: 这真是十分友好体贴的举动。

sentences.en: Jim raised his hands in a despairing gesture.
sentences.cn: 吉姆举起双手，做出绝望的手势。

sentences.en: Luke made a rude gesture with his finger.
sentences.cn: 卢克用手指做了个下流的手势。

sentences.en: Luke made an obscene gesture with his finger.
sentences.cn: 卢克用手指做了一个下流的手势。

sentences.en: Mr Griffin made a jerky gesture.
sentences.cn: 格里芬先生急匆匆地做了个手势。

sentences.en: Sarah made a menacing gesture with her fist.
sentences.cn: 萨拉用拳头做了个威胁的手势。

sentences.en: She bowed her head in a gesture somehow reminiscent of royalty.
sentences.cn: 她低头的姿势让人想起皇室风范。

sentences.en: She opened her arms wide in an expansive gesture of welcome.
sentences.cn: 她展开双臂以示欢迎。

sentences.en: The Queen has now made a gesture towards public opinion.
sentences.cn: 女王现在摆出了尊重民意的姿态。

sentences.en: Their handshake appeared to be a gesture of reconciliation.
sentences.cn: 他们的握手似乎是和解的表示。

sentences.en: There is an enormous sense of mission in his speech and gesture.
sentences.cn: 他的一言一行都带着强烈的使命感。

sentences.en: They decided it would be a nice gesture to send her a card.
sentences.cn: 他们认为给她寄一张卡片会是一种友好的表示。

sentences.en: They expected a reciprocal gesture before more hostages could be freed.
sentences.cn: 在更多人质获得自由之前他们期望看到对方也有相应的表示。

sentences.en: With a gesture of frustration, she swept the cards from the table.
sentences.cn: 她懊恼地把桌子上的牌都拂到了地上。

sentences.en: 萨拉用拳头做了个威胁的手势。
sentences.cn: Sarah made a menacing gesture with her fist.

trans.tran_en: a movement of part of your body, especially your hands or head, to show what you mean or how you feel
a movement of part of your body, especially your hands or head, to show what you mean or how you feel
to move your hand, arm, or head to tell someone something, or show them what you mean
